alert.note: Alert for Eastern Las Animas County; Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Between 7500 and 11000 Ft; Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft; Walsenburg Vicinity, Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 3:48PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Huerfano and central Las Animas Counties through 445 PM MDT... At 347 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms over southeast Huerfano and central Las Animas Counties. These storms are nearly stationary and are capable of producing gusty winds, locally heavy rainfall, hail, and landspout tornadoes. HAZARD...Landspouts, winds in excess of 40 mph, and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Trinidad, Walsenburg, Aguilar, Cokedale, Starkville, Delhi, Gulnare, Hoehne, Tyrone, Boncarbo, Model, Segundo and Thatcher. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
